mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(WEEKDAY_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI')AS STARTTIME, TO_CHAR(WEEKDAY_END_TIME, 'HH24:MI')AS ENDTIME, CAR_PARK_NM,PAYORFREE_DIV, LOCX, LOCY FROM CAR_PARK WHERE ADDRESS LIKE #{sido1} || ' ' || #{gugun1} || '%' AND CAR_PARK_NM LIKE '%' || #{search_txt} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM CAR_PARK WHERE ADDRESS LIKE #{sido1} || ' ' || #{gugun1} || '%' AND CAR_PARK_NM LIKE '%' || #{search_txt} || '%'
SELECT CUL_LIFE, ADDRESS, PHONE, HOMEPAGE, LOCX, LOCY FROM CULTURAL_LIFE WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{sido1} || '%' AND ADDRESS LIKE'%'|| #{gugun1} || '%' AND CUL_LIFE LIKE '%' || #{search_txt} || '%'
